message: Hi Bob, let's start with a fair 50/50 split.
I think I deserve a bit more, 60/40 is still quite fair!
Bob, let's be reasonable.  Your share is losing value every round. I'll offer 55/45.
I'll meet you in the middle of our previous offers, but I still think I deserve a bigger share.
Bob, time is running out! Take this offer before inflation eats away even more of your potential gains. 60/40 is my final offer.
